text: 2002–03 Polish Volleyball League was the 67th season of Polish Championship (3rd season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). GTPS Gorzów Wielkopolski and Polska Energia Sosnowiec were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2002/2003 Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle and Galaxia AZS Częstochowa played in CEV Champions League, Skra Bełchatów, Gwardia Wrocław and Jastrzębie Borynia played in CEV Challenge Cup. Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle achieved 5th title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- | width="10" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | ||Qualified for the 2003–04 CEV Champions League |- | width="10" bgcolor="#bbebff" | ||Qualified for the 2003–04 CEV Top Teams Cup |- | width="10" bgcolor="#e6f8ff" | ||Qualified for the 2003–04 CEV Challenge Cup |- | width="10" bgcolor="#ffe7e7" | ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- | width="10" bgcolor="#ffcccc" | ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn- Koźle |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Galaxia AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|Jastrzębie Borynia |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |4 |align=left|Polska Energia Sosnowiec |- |5 |align=left|PZU AZS Olsztyn |- |6 |align=left|Skra Bełchatów |- |7 |align=left|Gwardia Wrocław |- |8 |align=left|Morze Bałtyk Szczecin |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|NKS Nysa |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|GTPS Gorzów Wielkopolski |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2003 Polish Champions |- |Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle 5th title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Roland Dembończyk, Piotr Lipiński, Marek Kardoš, Dusan Kubica, Rafał Musielak, Wojciech Serafin, Robert Szczerbaniuk, Jarosław Stancelewski, Sebastian Świderski, Paweł Papke, Aleksander Januszkiewicz, Bartłomiej Soroka |- |Head Coach |- |Andrzej Kubacki |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
